soru: A leader who demonstrates a democratic and co-operative style will deal with conflict by;
a: Trying to reconcile all persons involved in the conflict and tries to re-establish a pleasant and friendly atmosphere within the team.
b: Keeping a neutral position and does not participate in arguing.
c: Trying to clarify the reasons and causes of the conflict with all persons involved.
d: Deciding what to do and pushes his own opinion through.
cevap: a) Trying to reconcile all persons involved in the conflict and tries to re-establish a pleasant and friendly atmosphere within the team..

soru: Perception is based upon;
d: Information received as well as past experience and knowledge
cevap: d) Information received as well as past experience and knowledge.

soru: During the decision making process in the cockpit;
a: A detailed analysis can only be made once, at the moment the problem occurs.
b: The crew should always decide on more than one alternative.
c: The amount of time available has a large influence on the analysis of the situation.
d: Habits and routines play no role.
cevap: c) The amount of time available has a large influence on the analysis of the situation..

soru: A stress reaction is;
a: The specific stimuli causing a human body to respond.
b: The non-specific stimuli causing a human body to respond.
c: The specific response of the body to demands placed on a person.
d: The non-specific response of the body to demands placed on a person.
cevap: d) The non-specific response of the body to demands placed on a person..

soru: Person being exposed to extreme or prolonged stress factors can perceive;

b: Environment element of the SHEL model.
c: Software element of the SHEL model.
d: Hardware element of the SHEL model
cevap: b) Environment element of the SHEL model..

soru: During the decision making process in the cockpit;
a: Habits and routines play no role.

c: The crew should always decide on more than one alternative.

soru: Communication in the cockpit is primarily used for what purpose?
a: It is the main tool to ensure coordination
b: It is the main tool to ensure comprehension
c: It is the main tool to ensure harmony
d: It is the main tool to ensure understanding
cevap: a) It is the main tool to ensure coordination.

soru: Signs of stress include;
a: Faster, deep inhalation, stabbing pain around the heart.
b: Perspiration, dry mouth, dilated pupils, fast breathing.
c: Rising of the blood pressure, pupils narrowing, stabbing pain around the heart.
cevap: b) Perspiration, dry mouth, dilated pupils, fast breathing..

c: Being aware of one’s limitations and capabilities

soru: Define human information processing?
a: The interpretation of neural illusions in the brain
b: The transmission of nerve impulses to the brain where they are interpreted
c: The transmissions of nerve impulses to the brain where the information is interpreted and decisions are made
d: The transmission of nerve impulses via the neural path ways to the brain where they are interpreted decisions are made and action is taken
cevap: d) The transmission of nerve impulses via the neural path ways to the brain where they are interpreted decisions are made and action is taken.

soru: What errors are associated with skill-based behavior?

soru: What are the three cognitive elements necessary to create and adequate situational awareness?

c: Where is the aircraft, where is it going, how is the fuel doing

soru: Having successfully overcome a stressful situation once, how will the person react if placed in the same or similar situation a second time?
a: There will be a little difference
b: Stress will increase because he will be afraid of what he knows lies ahead
c: Stress will reduce because, having already successfully overcome the stressful situation, he will be confident he can do so again
d: Experience can not affect reaction to stress
cevap: c) Stress will reduce because, having already successfully overcome the stressful situation, he will be confident he can do so again.

soru: What are Stress Factors or Stressors?
b: Circumstances or events which provoke any kind of reaction to the demands placed upon the human organism
c: Events and circumstances which cause stress
d: Measures of stress exhibited by a person
cevap: c) Events and circumstances which cause stress.

soru: Aşağıdakilerden hangisi flight monitoring’in faydalarından biri değildir?

soru: BOEING uçakları için kullanımda olan  M.E.L.  dökümanı hangi kuruluş tarafından hazırlanır?
AIRBUS uçakları için kullanımda olan  M.M.E.L.  dökümanı hangi kuruluş tarafından hazırlanır?
M.M.E.L.,bir uçuşu güvenli bir şekilde gerçekleştirebilmek için gereken ve kabul edilebilen parçaların en az kaç adet olabileceğini gösteren dökümandır.Bu döküman;
a: Havayolu Şirketi tarafından hazırlanır ve Sivil Havacılık Otoritesi (SHGM) tarafından onaylanır.
b: Uçak Üreticisi tarafından hazırlanır ve Sivil Havacılık Kuruluşu (EASA/FAA) tarafından onaylanır.
d: Uçak Üreticisi tarafından belirlenen listeye göre Havayolu İşleticisi tarafından hazırlanır.
cevap: b) Uçak Üreticisi tarafından hazırlanır ve Sivil Havacılık Kuruluşu (EASA/FAA) tarafından onaylanır..

soru: Bir sistem, komponent veya ekipmanın, görevini yerine getiremeyecek kadar hasarlı olduğu ya da dizayn limit ve töleransları için de sabit bir performans gösterememesi durumuna ne denir?

a: is always equal to VEF (Engine Failure speed).
b: is the airspeed on the ground at which the pilot is assumed to have made a decision to continue or discontinue the take-off.
c: is an airspeed at which the aeroplane is airborne but below 35 ft and the pilot is assumed to have made a decision to continue or discontinue the take-off .
d: is the airspeed of the aeroplane upon reaching 35 feet above the take-off surface

soru: Optimum range altitude’in altında uçmak avantaj sağlayabilir, çünkü;

cevap: a) a more favourable wind may give a greater ground distance.

soru: The centre of gravity of a body is that point;
a: which is always used as datum when computing moments.

c: where the sum of the external forces is equal to zero.
d: through which the sum of the forces of all masses of the body is considered to act.
cevap: a) which is always used as datum when computing moments..

soru: Which of the followings is correct for RVR?
a: RVR should be best possible assessment of the range, over which the pilot of an aircraft on the extended centerline of a runway can see the approach lights
b: RVR should be best possible assessment of the range, over which the pilot of an aircraft on the center line of a runway can see the runway surface markings or the
c: RVR is the distance along the runway, which a lighted object can be seen

cevap: b) RVR should be best possible assessment of the range, over which the pilot of an aircraft on the center line of a runway can see the runway surface markings or the.

A commercial flight is planned with a turbojet aeroplane to an aerodrome with a landing distance available of 2400 m. The aeroplane mass must be such that on arrival the aeroplane can be landed within dry runway:
ETOPS flight is a twin engine jet aeroplane flight conducted over a route, where no suitable airport is within an area of;
a: 60 minutes flying time in still air at the normal cruising speed
b: 60 minutes flying time in still air at the approved one engine out cruise speed
c: 75 minutes flying time at the approved one engine out cruise speed

cevap: b) 60 minutes flying time in still air at the approved one engine out cruise speed.

The speed V2 is;

b: The lowest airspeed required to retract flaps without stall problems
c: That speed at which the PIC should decide to continue or not the take off in the case of an engine failure.

cevap: d) The take off safety speed. The speed at which the aircraft may safely become airborne with one engine inoperative.

soru: A “Balanced Field Length” is said to exist where:

b: The one engine out take-off distance is equal to the all engine take-off distance

d: The clearway does not equal the stopway
cevap: c) The accelerate stop distance is equal to the take-off distance available.

Contingency fuel is:
a: A quantity of fuel that should never be used but is carried in order to provide a final safety net;
b: Extra fuel carried in order to account for situations such as degraded aeroplane or pilot performance or adverse weather;
c: Fuel carried to permit holding over a specific point for at least the time specified in the Operations Manual;
d: The total fuel required to operate a route or route segment.
cevap: b) Extra fuel carried in order to account for situations such as degraded aeroplane or pilot performance or adverse weather;.

soru: For a land-based aeroplane, sea survival equipment is to be carried:

When flying over water more than 50 Km from the shore where the en-route ‘'engine out' limitations apply

soru: An aircraft which is not concerned with regular international flights and is operated to or via an aerodrome of a member State may stay within that state without paying customs duty on fuel, oil, spare parts etc. during a period:

cevap: c) take all appropriate measures to restore control of the aircraft to its lawful commander or preserve control of it.

c: certificate of  airworthiness, certificate of registration, appropriate licences of each crew member and the aircraft’s radio station licence
d: appropriate licences of each crew member, certificate of  airworthiness, certificate of registration and receipts for all fuel purchased outside the aircraft’s own State
cevap: c) certificate of  airworthiness, certificate of registration, appropriate licences of each crew member and the aircraft’s radio station licence.

soru: ICAO recommends:
The governing body of ICAO is:

a: notify ICAO at its Montreal headquarters; other member States must rely on ICAO to notify them of all such deviations

soru: Which of the following statements about ICAO Standards and Recommended Practices (SARPs) is most correct?

b: all member states are expected to incorporate all standardsinto their aviation law but recommended practices are procedures which states are recommended to adopt

d: all member states are expected to incorporate all recommended practices into their aviation law but standards are procedures which states are recommended to adopt
cevap: b) all member states are expected to incorporate all standardsinto their aviation law but recommended practices are procedures which states are recommended to adopt.

soru: Article 16 of the ICAO convention gives each contracting state the right to search arriving or departing aircraft from other states and inspect documentation. The person responsible for ensuring that documentation is produced for inspection when requested is:

cevap: b) is convened once every three years.

soru: Which of the following statements about the Warsaw Convention is most correct?

c: it absolves operators from liability for passengers and cargo in cases of negligence

cevap: b) it limits the liability for passengers and cargo in cases of negligence.

d: the shipper's declaration for dangerous goods
cevap: a) the technical instructions for the safe transport of dangerous goods by air..

soru: The convention signed by the states and moved by a desire to endure adequate compensation for persons who suffer damage caused on the surface by foreign aircraft is:

Any person who suffers damage on the surface shall, upon proof only that damage was caused by an aircraft in flight or by any person or thing falling therefore will be entitled to compensation as provided by:
When letters are used for the registration mark combinations shall not be
a: three letters combinations used in the international code of signals
b: four letter combinations beginning with Q
c: five letter combinations used in the international code of signals
d: letters used for an ICAO identification documents
cevap: c) five letter combinations used in the international code of signals.

soru: The loading limitations shall include:
a: all limiting mass, centres of gravity position and floor loadings
b: all limiting mass and centres of gravity
c: all limiting mass, mass distributions and centres of gravity
d: all limiting mass, centres of gravity position, mass distributions and floor loadings
cevap: d) all limiting mass, centres of gravity position, mass distributions and floor loadings.

soru: According to ICAO Annex 8, a certificate of airworthiness shall be renewed or shall remain valid subject to the:
b: Laws of the State in which is operated
c: Laws of the State of registry and operation
d: Laws of the State of registry
cevap: d) Laws of the State of registry.

soru: The registration mark shall be letters, numbers or a combination of letters
c: the state of registry of local authority
cevap: c) the state of registry of local authority.

soru: An aircraft flying above the sea between 4 500 feet MSL and 9 000 feet MSL outside controlled airspace under VFR, must remain on principle at least:
a: Clear of clouds and in sight of the surface; 8 km visibility.
b: 1500 m horizontally, 1000 feet vertically from clouds; 8 km visibility.
c: 1500 m horizontally, 1000 feet vertically from clouds; 5 km visibility.
d: 2000 feet horizontally, 1000 feet vertically from clouds; 5 km visibility.
cevap: c) 1500 m horizontally, 1000 feet vertically from clouds; 5 km visibility..

soru: The VMC minima for an airspace classified as "G" above 10 000 feet MSL are:
a: 1 nautical mile horizontally and 1000 feet vertically from clouds; 8 km visibility
b: 1500 m horizontally and 1 000 feet verticaly from clouds; 5 km visibility
c: 1 nautical mile horizontally and 1 000 feet vertically from clouds; 5 km visibility
d: 1500 m horizontally and 1 000 feet vertically from clouds; 8 km visibility.
cevap: d) 1500 m horizontally and 1 000 feet vertically from clouds; 8 km visibility..

soru: A controlled flight is requested to inform the appropriate ATC unit whenever the average True Air Speed at cruising level varies or is expected to vary from that given in the flight plan by plus or minus:
An aircraft intercepted by another aircraft, if equipped with SSR transponder shall, unless otherwise instructed by the appropriate ATS unit, select one of the following code on mode "A"
A flashing red light from control tower during an approach to land means:
a: The airport is temporarily closed, continue circling
b: The airport is unsafe, do not land
c: Give way to other aircraft in emergency
d: Continue circling and wait for further instructions
cevap: b) The airport is unsafe, do not land.

soru: On aerodromes aircraft taxying on the manoeuvring area of an aerodrome shall give way to:
c: aircraft taking off or about to take off
d: all vehicles moving on the apron except the "follow me" vehicle
cevap: c) aircraft taking off or about to take off.

soru: An aircraft is flying under Instrument Flight Rules in an area where the visibility is unlimited and the sky is clear (free of clouds), when it totally loses radio communications. The procedure to be followed is:
a: land on the closest appropriate aerodrome, then advise Air Traffic Services of landing
b: adopt a VFR flight level and continue flight onto destination
c: continue flight onto destination, complying with last received clearances then with filed flight plan.
d: descend to En-route Minimum Safe Altitude and join closest airfield open to IFR operations
cevap: a) land on the closest appropriate aerodrome, then advise Air Traffic Services of landing.

soru: During an IFR flight in VMC in controlled airspace you experience a two-way
a: Land at the nearest suitable aerodrome maintaining VMC and inform ATC;
b: Select A7600 and continue according currenct flight plan to destination;
c: Descend to the flight level submitted for that portion of flight;
d: Land at the nearest suitable aerodrome and inform ATC
cevap: a) Land at the nearest suitable aerodrome maintaining VMC and inform ATC;.

soru: An aircraft which is being subjected to unlawful interference ('hijacked') and is forced to divert from the cleared track or cruising level without being able to communicate with ATS shall try to:
b: Continue at an altitude that differs from the semicircular rule with 1000 feet when above FL 290 and 500 feet when lower than FL 290
d: As soon as possible commence emergency descent in order minimize the difference betweencabin pressure and outside pressure
cevap: b) Continue at an altitude that differs from the semicircular rule with 1000 feet when above FL 290 and 500 feet when lower than FL 290.

soru: When has a flight plan to be filed at the latest:
a: 60 minutes before the flight plan becomes active.
b: 10 minutes before departure into an advisory area.
c: 60 minutes before departure or, if filed in flight, 10 minutes before the aircraft is estimated to reach the intended point of entry into a control area or advisory area or the point of crossing an airway or advisory route.
d: 60 minutes before departure or, if filed in flight, 30 minutes before the aircraft is estimated to reach the intended point of entry into a control area or advisory area or the point of crossing an airway or advisory route.
cevap: c) 60 minutes before departure or, if filed in flight, 10 minutes before the aircraft is estimated to reach the intended point of entry into a control area or advisory area or the point of crossing an airway or advisory route..

soru: Which of the following correctly lists special purpose codes that are to be used in conjunction with Secondary Surveillance Radar (SSR)?
Which of the following Annexes to the Chicago convention contains international standards and recommended practices for air traffic services (ATS)?
While on IFR flight, a pilot has an emergency, which causes a deviation from an ATC clearance. What action must be taken?
a: The appropriate ATC unit shall be notified of the action taken as soon as circumstances permit
b: Request an amended clearance or cancel the IFR flight plan
c: Submit a detailed report to ATC within 24 hours
cevap: a) The appropriate ATC unit shall be notified of the action taken as soon as circumstances permit.

soru: An aircraft manoeuvering in an airport's circuit receives a series of red flashes from the control tower. This signifies that the aircraft must:
a: not land for the moment regardless of previous instructions.
c: return to land and that clearance to land will be communicated in due course.
d: not land because the airport is not available for landing.
cevap: d) not land because the airport is not available for landing..

soru: Whilst flying in an aerodrome's traffic circuit, an aircraft receives a series of green flashes from the tower. The aircraft:
a: must give way to another aircraft.
c: must land immediately and clear the landing area.
d: must come back to land and the landing clearance will be sent in due time.
cevap: d) must come back to land and the landing clearance will be sent in due time..

soru: While taxying an aircraft receives the following light signal from the control tower: series of red flashes. This signal means that the aircraft:
a: must vacate the landing area in use.
c: must return to its point of departure.
d: may continue to taxi to the take-off area.
cevap: a) must vacate the landing area in use..

soru: While taxiing, an aircraft receives from the airport controller the following light signal: a series of green flashes. This signal means that the aircraft:
b: may continue to taxy towards the take-off area.
c: must return to its point of departure.
cevap: b) may continue to taxy towards the take-off area..

soru: Which of the following signals is a distress signal?
a: In radiotelephony the spoken words PAN, PAN.
b: The repeated switching on and off the landing lights.
c: A parachute flare showing a red light.
d: The repeated switching on and off of the navigation lights.
cevap: c) A parachute flare showing a red light..

soru: Under which conditions may an aircraft on a straight-in-VOR approach continue it’s descend below the OCA?
a: When the aircraft is in visual contact with the ground and with the runway lights in sight
b: When the aircraft has the control tower in sight
c: When the aircraft is in contact with the ground but not with the runway in sight yet
cevap: a) When the aircraft is in visual contact with the ground and with the runway lights in sight.

soru: What will be the transponder mode and code for radio communication failure?
When an aircraft carries a serviceable transponder; the pilot shall operate the transponder:
a: Only when the aircraft is flying within controlled airspace.
b: Only when the aircraft is flying within airspace where SSR is used for ATS purposes.
c: At all times during flight, regardless of whether the aircraft is within or outside airspace where SSR is used for ATS purposes.
cevap: c) At all times during flight, regardless of whether the aircraft is within or outside airspace where SSR is used for ATS purposes..

soru: When the aircraft carries serviceable Mode C equipment, the pilot:
a: Shall continuously operate this mode only when directed by ATC.
b: Shall continuously operate this mode unless otherwise directed by ATC.
c: Shall continuously operate this mode regardless of ATC instructions.
d: Shall continuously operate this mode only when the aircraft is within controlled airspace.
cevap: b) Shall continuously operate this mode unless otherwise directed by ATC..

soru: The pilot of an aircaft losing two-way communications shall set the transponder to Mode A Code:
When an aircraft is subjected to unlawful interference, the pilot-in-command shall indicate the situation by setting the transponder to:
Pilots shall not operate the SSR special position indicator (IDENT) feature unless:
c: They operate a transponder with Mode C.

soru: When shall the SQUAWK IDENT button be pushed by the pilot?
a: After the setting of a different code has been requested by ATC.
b: For test purposes if the pilot is in doubt of the correct functioning of the transponder.
d: If the mode C equipment is unserviceable.
cevap: c) Only if requested by ATC..

soru: ATIS broadcast messages containing departure and arrival information should include cloud cover, when the clouds are:
a: Below 2 000 m (600 ft) or below the highest minimum sector altitude, whichever is the greater
b: Below 900 m (3.000 ft) or below the highest minimum sector altitude, whichever is the greater
c: Below 1 500 m (5.000 ft) or below the highest minimum sector altitude, whichever is the greater
cevap: c) Below 1 500 m (5.000 ft) or below the highest minimum sector altitude, whichever is the greater.

soru: The ATIS broadcast message should, whenever practicable, not exceed;
Whenever ATIS is provided, the preparation and dissemination of the ATIS message shall be the responsability of;
a: the meteorological office serving the aerodrome (s)
c: both air traffic services and the meteorological office
d: the unit as prescribed the states

soru: ATIS broadcast;
a: Shall not be transmitted on the voice of a VOR
b: Shall be transmitted on the voice channel of an ILS, on a discrete VHF frequency or on the voice channel of a VOR
c: Shall not be transmitted on the voice channel of an ILS
d: Shall only be transmitted on a discrete VHF frequency
cevap: c) Shall not be transmitted on the voice channel of an ILS.

soru: The Alerting Service is provided by:
b: The ATC unit responsible for the aircraft at that moment, when it is provided with 121.5 MHz.
d: The ATS unit responsible for the aircraft at that moment.
cevap: d) The ATS unit responsible for the aircraft at that moment..

soru: The phases related to an aircraft in emergency or believed in emergency are:
a: uncertainty phase, alert phase, distress phase and urgency phase.
b: uncertainty phase, urgency phase, distress phase.
c: uncertainty phase, distress phase, urgency phase.
d: uncertainty phase, alert phase, distress phase.
cevap: d) uncertainty phase, alert phase, distress phase..

soru: When an aircraft is experiencing difficulties, triggering of the alert phase is the responsibility of:
c: air traffic control and flight information centers.
cevap: c) air traffic control and flight information centers..

soru: Which is the content of section 2 of Air-Report (AIREP)?
c: Present position, estimated time of arrival (ETA).
d: Estimated time over FIR boundary, endurance.
cevap: a) Estimated time of arrival (ETA), endurance..

soru: Which letter is used in a flight plan to indicate that the flight commences in accordance with VFR and subsequently changes to IFR?
Which letter is used in a flight plan to indicate that the flight commences in accordance with IFR and subsequently changes to VFR?
In the event of a delay for an uncontrolled flight, which a flight plan has been submitted, the flight plan should be amended or a new flight plan submitted and the old one cancelled, when:
a: The delay is more than 30 minutes of the estimated time off-blocks.
b: The delay is more than 60 minutes of the estimated time off-blocks.
c: The delay is more than 60 minutes of the estimated time of departure.
d: The delay is more than 30 minutes of the estimated time off departure.
cevap: b) The delay is more than 60 minutes of the estimated time off-blocks..

soru: A pilot receiving an IFR clearance from ATC should:
b: Read back those parts containing level assignments, vectors or any part requiring verification.
c: Read back the initial route clearance, level assignments and transponder codes.
d: Read back the entire clearance as required by regulation.
cevap: d) Read back the entire clearance as required by regulation..

soru: The planned cruising speed for the first leg or all of the cruising portion of the flight must be entered in the speed box of a flight plan form. This speed is the:
If no ICAO identifier has been attributed to an alternate airport (box 16) of a flight plan form...
a: write XXXX in box 16 and indicate in box 18 (additional information) ALTN/followed by the name of the airport
b: write ZZZZ in box 16 and indicate in box 18 (additional information) ALTN/followed by the name of the airport.
c: write XXXX in box 16 and indicate in box 18 (additional information) DEGT/followed by the name of the airport
d: write ZZZZ in box 16 and indicate in box 18 (additional information) DEGT/followed by the name of the airport.
cevap: b) write ZZZZ in box 16 and indicate in box 18 (additional information) ALTN/followed by the name of the airport..

soru: Track separation between aircraft using the same NDB shall be applied requiring the aircraft to fly:
a: At least 45° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the facility.
b: At least 15° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the facility.
c: At least 30° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the facility.
d: At least 30° separated at a distance of 15 miles or more from the facility.
cevap: c) At least 30° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the facility..

soru: Track separation between aircraft using the same FIX shall be applied requiring the aircraft to fly:
a: At least 30° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the FIX.
b: At least 45° separated at a distance of 15 miles or more from the FIX.
c: At least 45° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the fix.
d: At least 30° separated at a distance of 15 miles or more from the FIX.
cevap: c) At least 45° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the fix..

soru: If an ATC clearance is not suitable to the pilot in command of an aircraft:
a: The pilot has to accept the ATC clearance because it has been based on the flight plan filed with ATC.
b: He may request another clearance and the ATC concerned has to accept the pilot request.
c: He may request and, if practicable, obtain an amended clearance.
d: The pilot should propose another clearance to the ATC concerned.
cevap: c) He may request and, if practicable, obtain an amended clearance..

soru: What are the controlled IFR separation methods applied by ATC?
cevap: a) Vertical, horizontal and composite separation..

soru: Track separation between aircraft using the same VOR shall be applied requiring the aircraft to fly:
a: At least 15° separated at a distance of 15 miles or more from the facility.
b: At least 30° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the facility.
c: At least 45° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the facility.
d: At least 15° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the facility.
cevap: d) At least 15° separated at a distance of 15 NM or more from the facility..

soru: Lights on and in the vicinity of aerodromes may be turned off, provided that they can be again brought into operation :
a: At least 5 minutes before the expected arrival of an aircraft
b: At least 30 minutes before the expected arrival of an aircraft
c: At least 15 minutes before the expected arrival of an aircraft
d: At least one hour before the expected arrival of an aircraft
cevap: d) At least one hour before the expected arrival of an aircraft.

soru: The definition of "Manoeuvring Area" is:
a: That part of an aerodrome to be used for take-off, landing and taxiing of aircraft, including apron(s).
b: That part of an aerodrome to be used for take-off, landing and taxiing of aircraft, excluding apron(s).
c: That part of an aerodrome to be used for take-off, landing and taxiing of aircraft, including movement area and apron(s).
d: None of the above is correct.
cevap: b) That part of an aerodrome to be used for take-off, landing and taxiing of aircraft, excluding apron(s)..

soru: One of the functions ensured by a radar control unit for the provision of approach control service is:
b: To apply a reduced vertical separation of 500 feet between IFR flights and VFR flights.
c: To apply a horizontal separation less than 5 NM.
d: To provide instructions in order to reduce separations minima, if accepted by the pilots.
cevap: a) To conduct surveillance radar approaches..

soru: The primary duty provided by a radar unit is:
a: To assist aircraft on the location storms.
b: To assist aircraft due to failure of airborne equipment.
d: To assist aircraft where navigation appears unsatisfactory.

soru: When radar identification of aircraft has been achieved, ATC unit shall:
a: Inform the aircraft only if communication's load permits it.
b: Inform the aircraft prior to issue any instructions or advice based on the use of radar.
c: not advise the aircraft before issuing instructions.
d: Inform the aircraft only if radar identification has been achieved without availability of SSR.
cevap: b) Inform the aircraft prior to issue any instructions or advice based on the use of radar..

soru: One of the functions ensured by a radar control unit for the provision of approach control service is:
a: To provide instructions to reduce the separation minima.
b: To apply a horizontal separation less than 5 NM.
c: To apply a reduced vertical separation of 500 feet between IFR and VFR flights.
cevap: d) To conduct precision radar approach (PAR)..

soru: In which section of AIP are contained information elements relating to areas and/or routes for which meteorological service is provided?
In which section of AIP are contained information elements relating to refueling facilities and limitations on refuelling services?
In which section of AIP are contained information elements relating to prohibited, restricted and dangerous areas?
The SIGMET service, is in the AIP, in the following part :
The informations concerning charges for aerodromes/heliports and Air Navigation Services are on the following part of the AIP;

Select the acronym corresponding to the following definition: an special NOTAM series notifying, by means of a specific format, an important change for the aircraft operations, due to a volcano activity, a volcano eruption or a volcanic ash cloud.
What is an ASHTAM used for?
d: Aerodromes closed by volcanic ash contamination.

soru: Tehlikeli madde kazası olaylarında, tehlikeli maddelerin havayolu ile taşınması esnasında hangi şartlar oluştuğunda kaza raporu yazılır?
a: Bir kişinin yaralanması ya da ölmesi, havaaracının zarar görmesi, yangın, sıvının akması, radyasyon yayılımı durumunda
b: Tehlikeli madde paketine yanlış etiket yapıştırılması durumunda
c: Tehlikeli madde paketinin etiketinin yırtılması durumunda
cevap: a) Bir kişinin yaralanması ya da ölmesi, havaaracının zarar görmesi, yangın, sıvının akması, radyasyon yayılımı durumunda.

soru: Aşağıdaki tanımların hangisi patlayıcılar için geçerlidir?
c: Su ile temas halinde tehlike arz ederler
cevap: a) Kütlesel patlama ve ısı yayarlar.

soru: Aşağıdaki tanımların hangisi gazlar için geçerlidir?
d: Sıkıştırılmış sıvı ve karışık zehirli maddelerdir
cevap: d) Sıkıştırılmış sıvı ve karışık zehirli maddelerdir.

soru: Tehlikeli maddelerin uçakta taşınabilmesi için, hangi şartların yerine  getirilmesi gereklidir?
a: Havayolu şirketine ait olan kargo taşımacılığı kurallarına uygun olmalıdır
b: ICAO/IATA Dangerous Goods Regulations taşımacılık kuralları ile uygun ambalajlama ve dokümantasyonu konusunda uyumlu olmalıdır
d: ICAO kuralları gereği tahditli maddeler uçaklarda taşınamaz
cevap: b) ICAO/IATA Dangerous Goods Regulations taşımacılık kuralları ile uygun ambalajlama ve dokümantasyonu konusunda uyumlu olmalıdır.

soru: Genel anlamda tahditli maddelerin el bagajı olarak veya el bagajında taşınmaları yasaktır. Fakat belirli kurallar çerçevesinde bir kısmının el bagajı olarak yolcu kabininde taşınmasına müsamaha gösterilebilir. Aşağıdakilerden hangileri bu istisnai durumlara örnektir?
Tehlikeli maddelerin kusursuz bir şekilde yüklenmesinden kim sorumludur?
Aşağıdakilerden hangisi gizli tehlikeli maddelere örnektir?
b: Bıçak, çamaşır suyu, tiner, makas, iğne
cevap: b) Bıçak, çamaşır suyu, tiner, makas, iğne.

soru: Tehlikeli maddelerin havayolu ile taşınmasında aşağıdakilerden hangisi pratik kural ve düzenlemelerin uygulanabilmesi için sık kullanılan dokümanlardır?
a: Flight Crew Operating Manual / Ground Operation Manual
b: Weight and Balance Manual / Loading Instruction
c: ICAOTechnical Instruction Manual / IATA Dangerous Goods Ragulation
d: Master Minimum Equipment List / Configuration Deviation List
cevap: c) ICAOTechnical Instruction Manual / IATA Dangerous Goods Ragulation.

soru: Paket üzerine ‘’THIS WAY UP’’ işareti en az kaç tane koyulmalıdır?
Uçağa Dangerous Goods yüklendiğinden kaptan nasıl haberdar olur?
cevap: b) NOTOC (special load notification to captain).

soru: Operatör, bir dangerous goods kaza ya da olayını kime rapor etmek zorundadır?
b: Kaza ya da olayın meydana geldiği ülkenin otoritesine
c: Resmi olarak böyle bir rapor vermeye gerek yoktur.

soru: ‘’CAO’’ etiketiyle işaratlenmiş bir Dangerous Goods paketi Kargo&Yolcu uçağına nasıl yüklenip, taşınabilir?
a: IATA DGR kurallarında belirtildiği şekilde yüklenir.
b: ’’CAO’’ işaretiyle etiketlenmiş bir paket yolcu uçağına yüklenemez.
c: ‘’ICAO Technical Instructions for the Safe Transport of Dangerous Goods by Air’’ (DOC-9284-AN/905)’te belirtildiği şekilde yüklenir.
d: Şirketin belirlediği usullere göre yüklenerek taşınır.
cevap: b) ’’CAO’’ işaretiyle etiketlenmiş bir paket yolcu uçağına yüklenemez..

soru: Uçuş ekibi olarak, yolcu ve/veya ekip üyesinin taşıdığı bir maddenin, uçakta taşınmasına müsaade edilip edilmediğine nasıl karar verilir?
a: Yolcu ve/veya ekip üyesi, dangerous goods sınıfına giren hiçbir maddeyi uçakta taşıyamaz.
b: Ekiplerin ’’excepted quantities’’ olarak adlandırılan muaf tutulmuş miktarları taşımasına izin verilmiştir.
c: TABLO 2.3.A’ya göre belirlenmiş bir takım Dangerous Goods’lar gerekli koşulların yerine getirilerek taşınmasına izin verilmiştir.
d: Yolcu ve/veya ekip üyelerinin hangi Dangerous Goods’ları taşıyabileceğine şirket karar vererek ilan eder.
cevap: c) TABLO 2.3.A’ya göre belirlenmiş bir takım Dangerous Goods’lar gerekli koşulların yerine getirilerek taşınmasına izin verilmiştir..

soru: Uçakta taşınmakta olan ve NOTOC’ta belirtilmiş olan DG UN 2950 adlı maddeye bağlı olarak uçuşta bir emergency olması durumunda, nereye başvurularak doğru müdahale edilebilir.
d: Operatörün hazırlamış olduğu Dangerous GoodsEmergency Manual

soru: Dangerous Goods’un sahip olduğu potansiyel tehlikeyi ilk kim belirler?
Hazard Label (Tehlike Etiketi) hazırlamaktan kim sorumludur?
Who is responsible for establishing operating minima (AOM)?
a:
The Operator,
b) ATC at the aerodrome,
c:
The Pilot-in Command,
d) The State of the Operator.
cevap:
a) The Operator,
b) ATC at the aerodrome,.

soru: For a land based aeroplane, sea survival equipment is to be carried:
a: When flying en-route over water beyond gliding distance from shore
b:
When flying over water more than 50 Km from the shore where the en-route 'engine out' limitations apply
c) When taking off or landing at an aerodrome where, in opinion of the Operator there is a danger of the aeroplane ditching due to the proximity of water
cevap: a) When flying en-route over water beyond gliding distance from shore.

soru: If it is not possible to file a copy of the OFP with the Operator (or agent) it sould be:
a: Posted to the Operator ( a certificate of proof of posting is required)
b: Teken in a sealed envelope to the next aerodrome where the Operator or agent has a representative
c:
Left with the aerodrome authorities
d) Sent to the aothority within 10 days
cevap:
c) Left with the aerodrome authorities
d) Sent to the aothority within 10 days.

soru: The purpose of the Master Minimum Equipment List (MMEL) is
a:
To permit the Authotity to specify what equipment must be carried in an aircraft with max take off mass greather than 5 700 kg
b) To permit one MEL to exist for the operator's entire fleet of aeroplanes
c) To permit the operator to change the content of the MEL whilst keeping a master unamended state
d: Not to be used as an Operator's MEL
cevap: d) Not to be used as an Operator's MEL.

soru: In order for a flight to be commenced under IFR:
a: IMC must be expected to exist all along the route
b: It must be reasonably expected that an instrument approach will be flown at the destination
c: A met report must indicate that IMC exists somewhere along the route
d: The met conditions must be equal to or better than the specified minima at the 	destination or destination alternate
cevap: d) The met conditions must be equal to or better than the specified minima at the 	destination or destination alternate.

soru: The Operator is responsible for the provision of an operating manual. It is to be relevant to ;
a: All aircraft types with a max take-off mass exceeding 5700kg
b: All the operators’ employees and all the operations conduced
c: The type of general aviation operations undertaken under an AOC
d: Operations staff and flight crew, and specific to aircraft type
cevap: d) Operations staff and flight crew, and specific to aircraft type.

soru: Bir devletin yetkili otoritesi tarafından yayınlanan ve havacılık bilgilerini kapsayan yayınlardır.
RPL’de olmayan bir seferimiz için ATC flight planının en az kaç saat önceden IFPS’e gönderilmiş olması gerekmektedir?
FAM (Flight Activation Monitoring) uygulamasının yapıldığı meydanlardan biri olan GVA meydanındaki bir seferin gecikmesi, vaktinde sisteme yansıtılmadığı için FLS mesajı gelmiştir.
Asagidakileriden hangisi NOTAM türlerinden degildir ?
Bütünleştirilmiş Havacılık Bilgi Paketi / Integrated Aeronautical Information Package  aşağıdaki hangi elementlerden oluşmaktadır?
b: AIP değişiklikleri (AIP SUP); AIC, Kontrol listeleri ve özetleri
c: NOTAM ve Uçuş – öncesi Bilgi Bültenleri (PIB);

soru: SNOWTAM veya NOTAM gibi bilgi formları hangi Jeppesen bölümünde gösterilmektedir?
NOTAMC aşağıdakilerden hangisidir?
Aşağıdakilerden hangisi Uçuş Bilgi Merkezleri (FIC)’nin Görevleri arasında değildir?

soru: ETOPS onayı olmaksızın performans A sınıfı iki motorlu, koltuk sayısı 20 veya daha fazla ve MTOW 45360 kg veya daha fazla olan bir uçağı uygun hava alanından .................dan uzak bir noktada işletemez?

JAR-OPS’a göre işletici iki motorlu uçaklar için meteorolojik yada performansa bağlı sebepler nedeniyle kalkış meydanına geri dönemiyorsa operasyonel uçuş planında.................meydanı belirlemeli ve ............saatlik uçuş mesafesinde olmalıdır.
a: Varış meydanı belirlemeli ve 1 saatlik uçuş mesafesinde olmalıdır.
b: Kalkış yedek meydanı belirlemeli ve 1 saatlik uçuş mesafesinde olmalıdır.
c: Varış yedek meydanı belirlemeli ve 1 saatlik uçuş mesafesinde olmalıdır.
d: Başka bir varış meydanı belirlemeli ve 1 saatlik uçuş mesafesinde olmalıdır.
cevap: b) Kalkış yedek meydanı belirlemeli ve 1 saatlik uçuş mesafesinde olmalıdır..

soru: Yardımcı firma tarafından uçağın AFM’ inde belirtilen ve ICAO standart atmosfer şartlarında belirlenen maksimum kalkış ağırlığı için gereken kalkış mesafesidir?
Beklenmedik durum (Contengency) yakıtı aşağıdaki durumlardan hangisi olursa Trip yakıtının %3’ü olabilir?
a: Yol boyu meteorolojik olaylarda bir değişiklik olmayacağı kanaatine varılırsa
b: Yol boyu rüzgarlarda herhangi bir değişiklik olmayacağı kanaatine varılırsa
d: ATC herhangi bir değişiklik yapmayacağı biliniyorsa
cevap: c) Yol boyunca yedek meydan sağlandığında.

soru: Uçağın yer yüzeyi üzerindeki yönü ...........dir?
Minimum diversion fuel yakıtı için aşağıdakilerden hangisi doğrudur?
cevap: d) Alternate fuel + Final reserve fuel.

soru: Climb gradient’in artışına neden olan etkenler olarak aşağıdakilerden hangisi yanlıştır?
a: Yükseklikte yoğunluğun düşmesi trust’ı azaltacağından climb gradient artacaktır.
b: Yükseklikte yoğunluğun düşmesi trust’ ı arttıracağından climb gradient artacaktır.
c: Sıcaklıkla yoğunluğun düşmesi trust’ı azaltacağından climb gradient artacaktır.
d: Climb gradient’in yoğunlukla bir ilişkisi yoktur.
cevap: b) Yükseklikte yoğunluğun düşmesi trust’ ı arttıracağından climb gradient artacaktır..

soru: JAR-OPS 1.490’ a göre ASDA mesafesinin belirlenmesi için yapılması gereken işlem nedir?
a: Uçağın V1 sürati göz önüne alınmalıdır.
b: Pist başlangıcından ana iniş takım mesafesi çıkarılmalıdır.
d: Pist başlangıcından burun iniş takım mesafesi çıkarılmalıdır.
cevap: d) Pist başlangıcından burun iniş takım mesafesi çıkarılmalıdır..

soru: Aşağıdakileden hangisi EASA-OPS 1.1045’e göre havayolu işletmelerinin sahip olması gerekli işletme manullerinden değildir?
Considering TAS for maximum range and maximum endurance, other factors remaining constant.
a: Both will decrease with increasing altitude.
b: Both will stay constant regardless of altitude.
c: Both will increase with increasing altitude.
d: TAS for maximum range will increase with increased altitude while TAS for maximum endurance will decrease with increased altitude.
cevap: c) Both will increase with increasing altitude..

soru: What is Localizer Outer Marker ?
a: Outer Marker combined with an NDB used as part of ILS

cevap: a) Outer Marker combined with an NDB used as part of ILS.

soru: The shortest distance in kilometres between 17°27'N 019°30'W and 38°00'S 019°30'W is:
When a controlled flight inadvertently deviates from its current flight plan, ATC has to be informed in case:

cevap: b) the TAS varies by plus or minus 5% of the TAS notified in the flight plan..

b: Devlet başkanı veya aynı statüdeki kişileri taşıyan uçuşlar(STS/HEAD).

a: Basınç değerleri tam merkezden itibaren dışa doğru artar, merkezde izobarların sarktığı oluğa trof ismi verilir, kuzey yarımkürede rüzgarlar merkezden dışarıya doğru saat istikameti yönünde bir dönüşle eserler.
b: Basınç değerleri tam merkezden itibaren dışa doğru azalır, merkezde izobarların sarktığı oluğa trof ismi verilir, kuzey yarımkürede rüzgarlar merkezden dışarıya doğru saat istikametinin tersi yönünde bir dönüşle eserler.
c: Basınç değerleri tam merkezden itibaren dışa doğru artar, izobarların merkezden dışa doğru uzantıları sırt olarak isimlendirilir, kuzey yarımkürede rüzgarlar merkezden dışarıya doğru saat istikameti yönünde bir dönüşle eserler.
d: Basınç değerleri tam merkezden itibaren dışa doğru artar, merkezde izobarların sarktığı oluğa trof ismi verilir, kuzey yarımkürede rüzgarlar merkezden dışarıya doğru saat istikametinin tersi yönünde bir dönüşle eserler.
cevap: d) Basınç değerleri tam merkezden itibaren dışa doğru artar, merkezde izobarların sarktığı oluğa trof ismi verilir, kuzey yarımkürede rüzgarlar merkezden dışarıya doğru saat istikametinin tersi yönünde bir dönüşle eserler..

d: Kaptan, Kabin Amiri ve gerekirse tüm ekip uçuştan hemen sonra rapor yazar. Raporların 72 saat içinde İlgili ülkelerin Sivil Havacılık Müdürlüklerine ulaştırılması gereklidir.
cevap: d) Kaptan, Kabin Amiri ve gerekirse tüm ekip uçuştan hemen sonra rapor yazar. Raporların 72 saat içinde İlgili ülkelerin Sivil Havacılık Müdürlüklerine ulaştırılması gereklidir..

soru: QNH Is the radiotelephony Q-code to indicate:
a: The atmospheric pressure at aerodrome elevation (or at runway threshold)
b: The altimeter sub-scale setting to obtain elevation when on the ground

cevap: b) The altimeter sub-scale setting to obtain elevation when on the ground.

soru: ICAO standart atmosferine göre ortalama deniz seviyesindeki sıcaklık aşağıdakilerden hangisidir?
Sıcaklığın yükseklikle artmasına ne denir?
Eş basınç değerlerinin birleştirilmesiyle elde edilen eğrilere ne denir?
Aşağıdaki fadelerden hangisi yanlıştır?
a: Ekvatorda tropopozun ortalama yüksekliği genelde 25-27 km’dir.
c: Yere yakın sıcaklık değerleri ne kadar yüksekse tropopoz seviyesi de o kadar yüksektir.
cevap: a) Ekvatorda tropopozun ortalama yüksekliği genelde 25-27 km’dir..

soru: Önemli meteorolojik olayların gerçekleştiği atmosfer katmanı aşağıdakilerden hangisidir?
Aşağıdaki ifadelerden hangisi yanlıştır?
b: Sabit basınç altında nem ilave etmeden havanın doymuş hale gelebilmesi için gereken sıcaklığa çiğ noktası (işba) sıcaklığı denir.
c: Uçuş seviyeleri ICAO Standart Atmosferinde 1013.25 hPa esas alınarak 500’er feet aralıklarla belirlenmiştir.
cevap: d) Troposferin tepesi stratopoz olarak adlandırılır..

soru: Kara ve deniz meltemleri, kara ve denizlerin farklı ısınma karakteristikleri neticesinde ortaya çıkan hava akımlarıdır. Buna göre aşağıdaki ifadelerden hangisi doğrudur?
a: Deniz meltemi gündüz karadan deniz doğru eser.
b: Kara meltemi gündüz karadan denize doğru eser.
c: Deniz meltemi gündüz denizden karaya doğru eser.
d: Kara meltemi gece denizden karaya doğru eser.
cevap: c) Deniz meltemi gündüz denizden karaya doğru eser..

soru: Aşağıdakilerden hangisi yer yüzeyindeki rüzgarlar üzerinde etkili değildir?
Ortalama deniz seviyesinden olan dikey mesafe aşağıdakilerden hangisidir?
Yukarı ve yer seviyesi rüzgarı ile ilgili aşağıdaki ifadelerden hangisi yanlıştır?
a: Rüzgar yönüne göre rota belirlenmesi yakıt tasarrufu sağlar.
b: Uçağın iniş ve kalkışında rüzgarın etkisi büyüktür.
d: İniş ve kalkışlarda belli bir şiddetin üzerindeki kuyruk rüzgarı tehlikelidir.
cevap: c) Uçak inerken yan rüzgar almalıdır..

soru: Sürtünme seviyesinin üstünde, basınç gradyan kuvveti, Coriolis kuvvet ve merkezkaç kuvvetinin dengelenmesi esnasında eğri izobarlara paralel ve sabit hızla esmekte olan rüzgara ………….. denir. Boşluğa aşağıdakilerden hangisi gelmelidir?
Rüzgarın yön ve hızında görece kısa bir mesafede meydana gelen ani değişikliktir. Bu tanım aşağıdakilerden hangisine aittir?
Jet akımları ile ilgili aşağıdakilerden hangisi yanlıştır?
a: En düşük eksen hızı 40KT olarak kabul edilmektedir.
b: Jet kanalı içinde rüzgar hızının en yüksek değere ulaştığı yere jet çekirdeği (Jet Core) denir.
c: Yukarı troposferde veya aşağı stratosferde meydana gelir.
d: Yatay sıcaklık dağılımındaki büyük farklar jet akımlarının oluşmasına sebep olur.
cevap: a) En düşük eksen hızı 40KT olarak kabul edilmektedir..

soru: Türbülans ile ilgili aşağıdakilerden hangisi yanlıştır?
a: Türbülans, akışkan maddelerin moleküllerinin düzensiz hareketinden kaynaklanan bir doğa olayıdır.
b: SWC kartlarında hafif şiddette türbülans bölgeleri gösterilmez.
c: Şiddetli türbülans uçağa yapısal zarar verebilir.

soru: Türbülansın oluşumunda aşağıdakilerden hangisi rol oynamaz?
Kar yağışı için yer seviyesindeki sıcaklığın ne olması gerekir?
Aşağıdakilerden hangisi bir türbülans çeşidi değildir?
Açık hava türbülansı (CAT) ile ilgili aşağıdaki ifadelerden hangisi yanlıştır?
a: Yukarı seviyelerdeki bulutlar içerisinde meydana gelir.
b: Her jet akımının bulunduğu yerde CAT görülmeyebilir.
d: Keskin oluklarda orta kuvvette ve kuvvetli CAT'e rastlanır.

soru: Aşağıdakilerden hangisi bağıl nemin tanımıdır?
a: Belirli bir sıcaklıkta hava içerisinde bulunan su buharı miktarının, aynı sıcaklık ve basınçta havanın tutabileceği maksimum su buharı miktarına oranıdır.
b: Verilen bir hacim içerisindeki su buharının kütlesini, diğer moleküllerin (kuru havanın) kütlesine bölerek elde edilir.
c: Hava doygun olduğu zaman su buharı molekülleri tarafından uygulanan basınçtır.
d: 1 m³ hava içerisinde bulunan su buharının gram cinsinden kütlesine denir.
cevap: a) Belirli bir sıcaklıkta hava içerisinde bulunan su buharı miktarının, aynı sıcaklık ve basınçta havanın tutabileceği maksimum su buharı miktarına oranıdır..

soru: Herhangi bir nedenle düşey olarak hareket eden bir hava parseli, sebebin ortadan kalkmasından sonra eski yerine gelebiliyorsa, bu parseli çevreleyen hava için “………..”, eski durumuna dönemiyorsa “…………..” söz konusudur. Boşluklara aşağıdakilerden hangisi gelmelidir?

a: Bir hava alanında ölçülen lokal basınç değerinin deniz seviyesine indirgenmesi neticesinde elde edilen basınç değeri veya irtifa değeridir.
b: Hava meydanlarında meteoroloji istasyonlarının elde ettikleri istasyon basıncına denir.
c: İstasyon basıncının standart atmosferdeki irtifa değeridir.
cevap: b) Hava meydanlarında meteoroloji istasyonlarının elde ettikleri istasyon basıncına denir..

soru: Aşağıdaki ifadelerden hangisi doğrudur?
a: Güney Yarım Küre’de alçak basınç etrafında hareket eden hava saat ibrelerinin ters yönünde döner.
b: Güney Yarım Küre’de yüksek basınç etrafında hareket eden hava, saat ibreleri yönünde döner.
c: Kuzey Yarım Küre’de yüksek basınç etrafında hareket eden hava, saat ibrelerinin ters yönünde döner.
d: Kuzey Yarım Küre’de alçak basınç etrafında hareket eden hava, saat ibrelerinin ters yönünde döner.
cevap: d) Kuzey Yarım Küre’de alçak basınç etrafında hareket eden hava, saat ibrelerinin ters yönünde döner..

a: Düşük Nem-Aşağı yönlü akımlar(Diverjans)-Kararlı Hava Kütlesi
b: Yüksek Nem-Yukarı yönlü akımlar-Kararsız Hava Kütlesi

a: Yüksek bağıl nem, Bulutlu gökyüzü, Kararsız tabakalaşma
b: Düşük Bağıl Nem, Bulutlu gökyüzü, Kararsız tabakalaşma
c: Yüksek bağıl nem, Bulutsuz Gökyüzü, Kararlı tabakalaşma
d: Düşük bağıl Nem, Bulutsuz Gökyüzü, Kararsız tabakalaşma
cevap: c) Yüksek bağıl nem, Bulutsuz Gökyüzü, Kararlı tabakalaşma.

a: Volkanik patlama devam ediyor ama kül bulutları FL250’ye ulaşamıyor
b: Volkanın zaman zaman aktifleştiği biliniyor ve volkanın şuanda tehlikeli olduğu düşünülmüyor
c: Volkanik patlama devam ediyor. FL250’nin üzerinde kül bulutu rapor ediliyor ve volkan tehlikeli

cevap: c) Volkanik patlama devam ediyor. FL250’nin üzerinde kül bulutu rapor ediliyor ve volkan tehlikeli.

soru: Silyometre neyi ölçer?

cevap: d) Sağanak şeklinde yağışlar ve oraj.

soru: Bir soğuk cephenin sıcak cepheye yetişerek öne geçmesiyle meydana gelen cepheye ne ad verilir?
